properties.address: Multiple Sclerosis Centre, Mid Argyll, Lochgilphead, Argyll PA31 8JU
properties.description: Open from 07/11/22. We support people affected by long term conditions, older people and anyone affected by social isolation and loneliness. We are a busy community hub open 9 to 5 for various activities. On Mondays for 2 hours we will be running the Warm Space session offering soup, hot drinks and friendship.
